---
title: "Citeproc and Typst"
format: 
  typst:
    keep-typ: true
bibliography: refs.bib
citeproc: true
_quarto:
  tests:
    typst:
      ensureTypstFileRegexMatches:
      - ['<refs>', '<ref-Cronbach_1951>']
      - ['\#bibliography\([^)]*\)']
      ensurePdfRegexMatches:
      # Locators appear inline after author-date (citeproc drops "p." prefix)
      - ['\(Cronbach 1951a, 42\)', '\(1951b, 100']
      - []
      noErrors: default
---

Hello [@Cronbach_1951, @Cronbach_1952]

With locator: [@Cronbach_1951, p. 42]

Bare with locator: @Cronbach_1952[pp. 100-115]

# References
